hero.title: Welcome to Task Flow
hero.subtitle: Streamline your workflow and boost productivity
hero.description: The ultimate task management platform designed to help teams collaborate efficiently and achieve their goals faster.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your tasks effectively
features.description: Discover the tools that will transform how you manage tasks and collaborate with your team.

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.description: Create, organize, and track your tasks with ease. Set priorities, deadlines, and collaborate with your team.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Work together seamlessly with real-time updates, comments, and file sharing capabilities.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reports
analytics.description: Get insights into your productivity with detailed analytics and customizable reports.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Connect with your favorite tools and services to streamline your workflow.

securityFeature.title: Security & Compliance
securityFeature.description: Enterprise-grade security with comprehensive compliance features to protect your data and meet regulatory requirements.

globalIntegration.title: Global Integration Hub
globalIntegration.description: Connect with over 100+ popular tools and services through our powerful integration platform and custom APIs.

timeTracking.title: Time Tracking
timeTracking.description: Track time spent on tasks and projects with automatic timers and detailed reports.

teamCommunication.title: Team Communication
teamCommunication.description: Built-in chat, video calls, and commenting system to keep your team connected.

goalManagement.title: Goal Management
goalManagement.description: Set, track, and achieve your goals with our comprehensive goal management system.

betterTeamCollaboration.title: Better Team Collaboration
betterTeamCollaboration.description: Seamless communication and file sharing that brings your team closer together.

improvedGoalAchievement.title: Improved Goal Achievement
improvedGoalAchievement.description: Track and achieve your goals faster with our goal management system.

fasterProjectDelivery.title: Faster Project Delivery
fasterProjectDelivery.description: Streamlined workflows and automated processes to deliver projects on time.

readyToExperience.title: Start Your Success Story Today
readyToExperience.description: Join thousands of teams already experiencing these benefits. Start your free trial today.

testimonial4.text: The time tracking feature has revolutionized how we bill our clients. Absolutely fantastic!
testimonial4.author: David Wilson

testimonial5.text: TaskFlow's integration capabilities are unmatched. It connects with all our tools seamlessly.
testimonial5.author: Lisa Anderson

testimonial6.text: The mobile app is just as powerful as the web version. I can manage my team from anywhere.
testimonial6.author: James Rodriguez

stats.startTrialToday: Experience the difference that thousands of teams are already enjoying. Start your free trial today.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say

testimonials.description: See what our customers have to say about their experience with TaskFlow.

testimonial1.text: Task Flow has transformed how our team works. The collaboration features are outstanding!
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.text: The analytics dashboard gives us incredible insights into our productivity patterns.
testimonial2.author: Michael Chen

testimonial3.text: Simple, elegant, and powerful. Everything we needed in a task management tool.
testimonial3.author: Emily Davis
